platforms.name: Alignment Handbook
platforms.description: The Alignment Handbook is an open-source repository providing robust, production-ready training recipes for aligning language models with human preferences and safety standards. It offers modular implementations of key alignment techniques like Supervised Fine-Tuning (SFT), Direct Preference Optimization (DPO), and Reinforcement Learning from Human Feedback (RLHF), designed to work seamlessly with the Hugging Face ecosystem. Its unique value lies in offering battle-tested, scalable code and best practices distilled from real-world research, lowering the barrier for practitioners to build safer and more controllable LLMs.
keyFeatures: Modular recipes for Supervised Fine-Tuning (SFT) on instruction data
Implementation of Direct Preference Optimization (DPO) as an RLHF alternative
End-to-end Reinforcement Learning from Human Feedback (RLHF) pipeline

platforms.name: CTGAN
platforms.description: CTGAN (Conditional Tabular Generative Adversarial Network) is an open-source Python library for generating high-quality synthetic tabular data that mimics the statistical properties and complex relationships of real datasets. It is specifically designed to handle mixed data types (continuous and discrete columns) and skewed distributions, making it uniquely capable of preserving privacy while enabling data augmentation and sharing. Its primary audience includes data scientists, researchers, and developers working in environments with sensitive or limited data.
keyFeatures: Generates synthetic tabular data preserving column distributions and correlations
Handles mixed data types (continuous, discrete, categorical) natively
Uses conditional vectors and training-by-sampling to address imbalanced data

platforms.name: Stable Diffusion
platforms.description: Open-source text-to-image diffusion model that generates detailed images from text descriptions.
